Uses of Package
com.xhive.query.interfaces

Packages that use com.xhive.query.interfaces
com.xhive.dom.interfaces This package contains the library interfaces (for collections of documents) and X-Hive specific extensions to the W3C DOM Interfaces, as well as interfaces related to special DOM related data. 
com.xhive.query.interfaces This package contains the X-Hive query interfaces. 
 

Classes in com.xhive.query.interfaces used by com.xhive.dom.interfaces
XhiveQueryResultIf
          Represents an XPath/XPointer query result.
XhiveXQueryParam
          Deprecated. The usage of this class is deprecated in favor of XhiveXQueryQueryIf.setVariable(String, boolean) et al. Use XhiveNodeIf.createXQuery(String) to obtain a XhiveXQueryQueryIf.
XhiveXQueryQueryIf
          XhiveXQueryQueryIf represents a parsed query.
XhiveXQueryValueIf
          Represents an XQuery unit value.
 

Classes in com.xhive.query.interfaces used by com.xhive.query.interfaces
XhiveXQueryExtensionFunctionIf
          Interface for user written XQuery extensions.
XhiveXQueryValueIf
          Represents an XQuery unit value.
